mapper.select: SELECT protect_space_code as protectSpaceCode ,animal_insert_code as animalInsertCode ,use_state as useState ,implement_code as implementCode ,protect_space_reg_date as protectSpaceRegDate ,animal_protect_period as animalProtectPeriod FROM tb_protect_space ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTR(protect_space_code,14) as decimal) DESC;

SELECT member_id as memberId ,member_pw as memberPw ,level_code as level ,member_name as memberName ,member_phone as memberPhone ,member_addr as memberAddr ,member_email as memberEmail ,member_in_date as memberInDate FROM tb_member
